_description: Recipe for preparing woodcock, an excerpt from Liber cure cocorum — eleven couplets

CamMagPep1047.First Lines:
ffor wodecoke snyte Curlew alsothe byttour in fere wyth hym schall
                    goo…
CamMagPep1047.Last Lines:
…The Cormerant schall be rostyd I wyswith the byll A pon for
                    grete Cowntys
CamMagPep1047.Note: First two lines written as prose.
CamMagPep1047.Facsimiles:
Hodgett,  G. A. J.,
                        ed.  
             Stere Htt Well: a book of medieval refinements, recipes and remedies,
                from a manuscript in Samuel Pepys’s library.
         Adelaide: Mary Martin Books, [1970?]; Cambridge, 1972.
